snippet.title: Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland is now available for the PS4!

All fans who purchase Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland either digitally or physically within the first month of launch will receive the “Innocent Fairy” and “Fish Girl” costumes for Lulua via DLC. (Will not be available post launch)

www.koeitecmoamerica.com/lulua
